name: Rob Gorski ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
description:

tweet: @rarediseasemom There's no possible way to cure #autism. That's simply a fact. Seeking to improve what kids are struggling with to improve their quality of life isn't necessarily a bad thing.
